name: Redcap
description: A malevolent fey creature with a cap soaked in blood, known for its insatiable thirst for blood.
memorable: It requires the blood of humanoids to sustain its life, leading to unique vulnerabilities.
goals: To cause harm and spread fear while maintaining its bloody cap.
relations: May associate with other bloodthirsty creatures or fey, potentially encountered with other fey entities.
environment: Typically found in forests or dark places where it can ambush unsuspecting victims.
strengths: High Strength and Constitution, allowing it to deal significant damage and absorb hits.
weaknesses: Dependent on soaking its cap in blood; neglecting this can lead to exhaustion and death.
attacks: Utilizes a multiattack featuring a bleeding bite that can cause ongoing damage and pike attacks.
most_powerful_ability: Its ability to inflict a bleeding effect, requiring foes to take extra damage over time.
skills: Proficient in Athletics and Intimidation, making it effective in physical confrontations and imposing fear.
additional_information: Condition immunities to charmed and frightened
Resistance to nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage
Requires blood from humanoids to avoid exhaustion
Moves quickly in combat and has a high strength score
Low Charisma reflects its intimidating nature
test_queries: fey creature needing blood to survive
malevolent creature with a blood-soaked cap
ruthless fey known for its bite attacks
redcap tactics and abilities in combat
